extendedInfo.description: Watch High Quality Tamil Movies on your mobile over 2G/3G or WiFi!Watch the latest FULL LENGTH High Quality Tamil (Kollywood) Movies on your mobile for Free, beautifully presented for your selection!More movies to be added frequently, look out for frequent updates!Watch your favorite actor's super hit Tamil movies(Rajini,kamal,Vijay,Ajith,Surya,karthik,Dhanush,Arya,Simbu..).App requires 3G/WiFi connection to Watch Movies.IMPORTANT: 3G data tariff will apply as the video content is streamed from YouTube.Features:1.Stunningly Presented Layout for easy navigation2.Lightning fast Search on our database to locate the Movie that suits your mood ! (Browsing through the movie collection does not require a network connection). 3.Search by Movie Name, Actor, Actress.4.Auto detect network type and recommend the best format for you to select.5.Latest movies presented in a separate option6.App can be moved to SD Card (Android 2.2+)7.2012 new super hit movies Moonu,kalakalappu,ok ok,vettai,Aravaan,Madhubana kadai,Manam Kothi Paravai,Nanban,Dhoni,Rajapattai,vedi.DISCLAIMER: The content provided in this app is hosted by YouTube and is available in public domain. We do not upload any movies to YouTube. This app is just an organised way to browse and view these YouTube Videos.TAGS: Tamil movies,Desi movies, Indian Movies, Kollywood, Latest Movies, HQ, HD,Rajini movie,Rajini movies,Kamal movies,kamal movie,vijay movie,vijay movies,ajith movie,ajith movies,surya movie,surya movies.
